mapper.select: select * from Diet_Recipe_main where m_url = #{m_url}
select * from Diet_Recipe_introduce where i_url = #{m_url}
select * from Diet_Recipe_ingredient where i_url1 = #{m_url}
select * from Diet_Recipe_seqence where s_url = #{m_url} order by s_no asc
select * from ( select rownum rn,m_name,m_img_url,m_view,m_url from ( select * from Diet_Recipe_main where m_name like '%'||#{m_name}||'%' order by m_view desc)) where rn <=25

select * from ( select rownum rn,m_name,m_img_url,m_view,m_url from ( select * from Diet_Recipe_main where m_name like '%'||#{m_name}||'%' order by m_view desc))
where rn <=25
where rn between 26 and 50
where rn between 51 and 75
where rn between 76 and 100
where rn between 101 and 125
mapper.update: update Diet_Recipe_main set m_view = m_view + 1 where m_url =#{m_url}
mapper.select: select count(*) from Diet_Recipe_main where m_name like '%'||#{m_name}||'%'
